humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are no positive lymph nodes found in the axillary tissues (pNo/sn/). This matches with the new rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the examination was performed on a total organ resection of the right breast, without axillary tissues (without sentinel lymph node biopsy or axillary lymph node dissection). The microscopic description does not mention any metastasis in the lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the information provided, the pathologic N stage for this patient's cancer is N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis).
